items.content_html: Firebase-Starter-Kit is a lightweight, reusable repository that simplifies Firebase integration for your projects. It includes essential features like authentication, real-time data fetching, cloud messaging, storage management, and analytics. Perfect for quickly setting up scalable web or mobile apps with Firebase.
items.title: mrhassanali/Firebase-Starter-Kit:  Firebase-Starter-Kit is a lightweight, reusable repository that simplifies Firebase integration for your projects. It includes essential features like authentication, real-time data fetching, cloud messaging, storage management, and analytics. Perfect for quickly setting up scalable web or mobile apps with Firebase.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for manipulating large JSON objects in the browser via an aggregation pipeline inspired by MongoDB's concepts. Designed for use in front-end applications, this library allows you to perform aggregation, filtering, and transformation operations directly on objects stored in IndexedDB, LocalStorage, or in-memory,
items.title: Axel77g/js-aggregate: A lightweight library for manipulating large JSON objects in the browser via an aggregation pipeline inspired by MongoDB's concepts. Designed for use in front-end applications, this library allows you to perform aggregation, filtering, and transformation operations directly on objects stored in IndexedDB, LocalStorage, or in-memory,

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
